events.message: I was involved in a car accident yesterday where my vehicle was severely damaged in a collision with another driver.
The claim has been reviewed and categorised under auto accident as it involves a vehicle collision.
An insurance agent has been assigned to your case to assist with the process moving forward.
We acknowledge receipt of your auto accident claim and will begin processing immediately.
Please submit photos of your vehicle damage, the police report, and any witness statements to proceed.
All requested documents including police report and pictures of the damaged car have been uploaded.
A thorough investigation into the circumstances of your vehicle collision has been initiated.
The investigation is complete, confirming the other party was at fault for the accident.
We have proposed a settlement amount to cover the repair costs of your vehicle and related expenses.
Thank you for your prompt response and feedback regarding the proposed settlement offer.
Your auto accident claim has been approved based on the investigation and submitted documents.
The payment covering the repair costs and related damages has been processed and issued to your account.
Your auto accident claim is now officially closed, and we appreciate your cooperation throughout the process.
